formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ICES' =-
[Synopsis] Encode and stream using 'ices'
[Description] ICES(config.xml) Streams to an icecast server using ices (available separately). A configuration file must be supplied for ices (see examples/asterisk-ices.conf).

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -6,4 +6,6 @@ [Description] ICES(config.xml) Streams to an icecast server using ices (available separately). A configuration file must be supplied - for ices (see examples/asterisk-ices.conf). + for ices (see contrib/asterisk-ices.xml). + + - ICES version 2 cient and server required.
